pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inference in Regressions with Shift-Share Structure // Provides confidence intervals in least-squares regressions when the variable of interest has a shift-share structure, and in instrumental variables regressions when the instrument has a shift-share structure. The confidence intervals implement the AKM and AKM0 methods developed in Ado, Kolesr, and Morales (2019) doi:10.1093/qje/qjz025.
